name: who-am-i-request
description: Represents a BACnet Who-Am-I request, used to query device identity information.

fields.name: vendor-id
fields.description: The vendor identifier of the device.

fields.name: model-name
fields.description: The model name of the device.

fields.name: serial-number
fields.description: The serial number of the device.
